home2.introText1: I am passionate about <0>web development</0>, both front-end and back-end.
home2.introText2: I am currently studying Computer Science engineering at <0>ISIMA</0> while working at <1>PI System Automation</1>, a company in the <2>Galilé</2> group.
home2.introText3: I’ve had the opportunity to carry out various projects, both academic and personal, to master multiple programming languages and technologies.
home2.introText4: I particularly enjoy programming in <0>JavaScript</0> and using frameworks like <1>React</1> and <2>Next.js</2>.
